name: Fill That Hole!
description:
Emergency! Emergency! There is a large pothole in the road! Fortunately, the pothole squad is at the ready, able to bend their bodies into fantastic shapes so they can FILL! THAT! HOLE!

Two game modes:

Choosy Mode: Cycle through all seven blocks freely to find the perfect fit to cover the hole.

Random Mode: Have access to just two blocks at a time to switch between. Get another one randomly after each block you drop.

Best played with an Xbox Controller (controls viewable in game), but playable with a keyboard as well:

Keyboard Controls:

Arrow Keys - Move block left/right and drop

W - Change block

Q/E - Rotate Block

Space - Vroom

Esc - Reset game (i.e. if car gets stuck)

Code: https://twitter.com/TegoValo

Art: https://twitter.com/bcbcboy

Music: Zach Calabro

Voices: https://twitter.com/willbucknum

"""NOW YOU'RE THINKING WITH POTHOLES"""
